content:
Ah, you're here... are you real?
Oh, you see, after performances,
I often sleepwalk around here.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
For example, I asked Amira, who was performing with me,
"What are you looking at?"
He replied, "How would you know I'm looking at you if you're not looking at me?"
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
As long as you live life
with joy and mindfulness,
you'll never fall from your dreams.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I can't tell anymore, is this all just an act or...
But maybe that's just how life is!
Whether it's a dream or reality, who cares~!
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I call this "The Reality of Now",
Gahahahaha~ga! Or you could say it's
"Whatever Goes" reality!
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Last night I dreamed I fell asleep in Lumia,
There was this sweet soda-like scent in Lumia too,
When I woke up, I found myself under Sani's car.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
When I'm not performing,
I randomly pick an "acting partner" from around the world,
and observe their reactions to create an impromptu performance.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
If you treat everyone like a camera watching you,
wouldn't that be exhausting?
That's why I only use myself as my own mirror.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
In my free time, I love making all kinds of masks.
These masks are like frozen expressions,
reminding people of moments when they felt those emotions.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content: How wonderful! The wanderers in this world don't realize they're part of this elegant performance themselves.{短暂停} The show ended with Amira pinching my nose.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
At this moment,
as you stand before me, wearing that "expressionless" face,
could it be... you're hiding behind life's mask?
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
When I have nothing to do, I practice performing in my mind.
At my peak, I had 52 actors in my head.
I numbered them as "Kings, Clowns, and Soldiers."
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I see this world as one gigantic—
Theater troupe!
But wait, where are all the cameras?
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Then, I'll have them act out different plays with each other.
But every single time, it's the clown who saves the world!
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
And then my ears hurt so much!
Is this the price I have to pay for sleeping under Sani's car?
If I keep sleeping in weird places, will my ears grow as long as Sani's...
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊
